title: #282 - Connor grills the new DP Editor!
itunes:title: #282 - Connor grills the new DP Editor!
description: This week, Dans in Italy with his beautiful wife eating a slice of 'Za, and taking a picture of him holding up the leaning tower of Pisa. If you came for philosophy this week, Think again! Connor dresses down Drunken Philosophy's new editor Joe trying to figure out if he is part clown. We also find out that he would rather be cheated on then do the cheating. We will be back next week with that sweet philosophy you have come to enjoy!
